page.title: 10 Middle Farm Dorchester.
page.content: Mrs Collins rents the farmhouse at Middle Farm with her family. Previously her father and brother worked on farms. It is really a private house and not used as a farm. The Dutchy of Cornwall owns the farm, so they rent it. It was built in 1885 .They don't have any farm animals, or any animals that make products but they do have two guard dogs, seven cats and a donkey. They have a small orchard and goosebery bushes. Although the house is very old they still have cellars which are propped up by brick walls so that they won't fall in. There are still hooks where they hung their meat and racks where they kept the wine that they made.Mrs Collins husband has a Gipsy caravan that they take to steam rallys.
